resources.string: Alert
You are not connected to the internet. Please check your settings or try again later.
Please enter a valid URL that you would like to import.
Sorry, your search found no result.\nPlease try again.
Downloaded RCCD file is invalid. Please check your entered URL correctly.
Unzipping of downloaded RCCD file failed. Please contact your administrator.
File system error. Unable to process the downloaded RCCD file, please contact your administrator.
Sorry, downloaded RCCD file does not have a valid certificate. Please try again.
Downloaded RCCD file is invalid. Please try again.
Provider %s (%s Services) was imported from the RCCD file
This removes all previously imported providers,services and related certificates.
This removes all previously imported certificates.
Received certificate for %s Service will be loaded onto the server by the browser.
Received certificate for %s Service and KeyTalk would like to install the certificate. System may ask you to enable screen lock, if not enabled. Please use 12345 as installation password.
Certificate for %s Service is successfully installed and you can access the server through the browser.
Certificate for %s Service installation failed and you can not access the server through the browser.
Your password will expire within %s days. Do you want to reset the password?
Your password will expire within few hours. Do you want to reset the password?
Certificate for %s Service installation failed and you can not access the server through the browser. Do you want to reinstall the certificate?
System may ask you to enable screen lock, if not enabled. Please use 12345 as installation password.
Found certificate for %s Service and KeyTalk would like to install the certificate. System may ask you to enable screen lock, if not enabled. Please use 12345 as installation password.
Valid certificate available but a URL is missing. Please contact your administrator for target URL.
Do you want to report any issues to your administrator?
This certificate may access your data, do you want to continue?
Continue
